div.p: BETTER COME DOWN TO SICK BAY
IT CAN BE PUT BACK IN.
OR IT WAS THE MOST INCREDIBLE
ANY OF A NUMBER OF CAUSES--
PUT THAT SHIP WE SAW INTO SPACE.

p.span: WE ARE BEAMING DOWN TO A

div.p: AND A WHOLE PILE OF OTHER STUFF.
A LURE SET BY THE OTHERS
IT MIGHT BE A LONG WAIT.
TAKE ME TO THE ONE IN CHARGE.
I WISH TO SPEAK TO HIM.
SEE WHAT YOU CAN PICK UP

p.span: I DO NOT KNOW WHERE I AM.

div.p: YOU SAW HIM ON THE SHIP.
I SAW YOU ON MY SHIP!
TO YOUR HOME, YOU MAY GO.
WE COME FROM A FAR PLACE
YOU MUST TAKE US TO HIM.
I MUST LEARN WHAT TO DO.
IF YOU GAVE US SOME IDEA OF
WHAT THEY WERE USING YOU FOR.

p.span: I SEEM TO HAVE A BODY

div.p: WE CAME TO PUT YOU BACK.
TO GET TO YOU AS QUICKLY
SO WE CAN HOME IN ON.

p.span: PART OF WHAT I AM DOING.

div.p: I MUST NOT KNOW THE SECRET!
NO ONE MAY KILL A MAN!
I DO NOT WISH TO KILL.

p.span: WE DO NOT KNOW HOW LONG

div.p: YOU MUST MOVE TO THE SURFACE,
WHAT AM I SUPPOSED TO DO?
WHAT AM I SUPPOSED TO DO?
I'M TRYING TO THREAD A NEEDLE
WHAT AM I SUPPOSED TO DO?
NO ONE CAN RESTORE A BRAIN.

p.span: THAT HE CAN DRAW ON SPOCK'S

div.p: I MIGHT BE ABLE TO HELP.
